subject: Re: Order #SSN2420 confirmed
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Andre Vabi,    We apologise for the delay. Our warehouse in Germany is currently out of stock, and the new shipment is expected to arrive on Wednesday. We will send it to you via DHL, and it should arrive soon. Thank you for your understanding.

Hi Andre Vabi,    The inventory replenishment we sent to our German warehouse has arrived, but the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 is still out of stock. We can upgrade you to the 3-pedal version Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 at a discounted price of $30 and ship it to you immediately via DHL. Alternatively, we can ship it to you immediately from China via UPS Express, or you can continue to wait until next Monday for shipment from Germany. Please let me know your choice.

Hi, Thanks for the Informations. I will wait until Monday for Shipping from the German Warehouse. If it is than also Not in the Warehouse, than give me a Short Info. Kind regards, André Vabi Von meinem iPhone gesendet Am 29.08.2025 um 05:51 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Andre Vabi, 
 
 The inventory replenishment we sent to our German warehouse has arrived, but the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 is still out of stock. We can upgrade you to the 3-pedal version Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 at a discounted price of $30 and ship it to you immediately via DHL. Alternatively, we can ship it to you immediately from China via UPS Express, or you can continue to wait until next Monday for shipment from Germany. Please let me know your choice. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On
 Mon, 25 Aug at 9:43 PM
 , service@simsonn.com

Hi Andre Vabi,    We have shipped your order of 3 pedal sets. Since our German warehouse staff have finished work for the day, we can only process further shipments next week. If you wish to proceed, you may pay the $19 fee by clicking this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

I don‘t understand the last E-Mail. You Said the 2 Pedal Set comes on Monday to the German Warehouse. And Said that if I want, i can get a set of 3 for the Price of 30 Dollar. Now you say 19,90 Dollar and that you have already Ship the 3 Pedal Set to me? Please let me know whats going on. Thanks, André Von meinem iPhone gesendet Am 29.08.2025 um 11:10 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Andre Vabi, 
 
 We have shipped your order of 3 pedal sets. Since our German warehouse staff have finished work for the day, we can only process further shipments next week. If you wish to proceed, you may pay the $19 fee by clicking this link. 
 
https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference
